summary: This document is an email forwarding a CNN news article from July 12, 2019, which reports that Jeffrey Epstein allegedly hired private investigators to stalk and intimidate his victims and witnesses. The email appears to be a forwarded news link, highlighting allegations of witness intimidation.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the forwarded CNN article, which alleges he hired private investigators to stalk his victims and witnesses.

events.title: CNN reports on Epstein's alleged witness intimidation
events.description: CNN publishes an article alleging Jeffrey Epstein hired private investigators to stalk his victims and witnesses.

keyFacts: A CNN article from July 12, 2019, alleges Jeffrey Epstein hired private investigators to stalk his victims.
The allegations specifically involve the intimidation of witnesses in his case.
The document is an email forwarding this news article, indicating the information was being circulated.
